As suggested by Trazora sis  the first quarter  Uob is more lenient. If u miss the first month it‚Äôs ok. So far clinics are not excluded. The only excluded one by most cards is 8062.When unsure always use amaze + empty wallet to test. U scared embarrassed more or scared 0 cash back more. Your choice. No right no wrong.
